ResearchProjectDef.label: Fighters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cheap, small, and fast, these small aircraft are designed to get a single person or small strike team to a nearby destination quickly. Larger fighter aircraft are capable of conducting small bombing runs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Transport Ships
ResearchProjectDef.description: While slow and expensive, and with less bombing capability than a bomber, trasport ships are still an essential part of any fleet for getting entire squads or platoons of soldiers across large distances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bombers
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's all in the name. A bomber is a very large aircraft capable of conducting devastating bombing runs, with limited capability of doing much else.
